Module com.pld.agile
Package com.pld.agile.utils.view

Class ViewUtilities

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.utils.view.ViewUtilities
public class ViewUtilities extends Object
Utility class providing static methods for various purposes.

    • lerpValue

      public static double lerpValue(double x, double y, double p)
      Returns the linear interpolation between two values.
      Parameters:
      x - The first value.
      y - The second value.
      p - The percentage of interpolation (between 0 and 1).
      Returns:
      The interpolated value.

    • mapValue

      public static double mapValue(double x, double min1, double max1, double min2, double max2)
      Returns the linear interpolation of a value from a range to another range.
      Parameters:
      x - The value to be interpolated.
      min1 - The min of the initial range.
      max1 - The max of the initial range.
      min2 - The min of the destination range.
      max2 - The max of the destination range.
      Returns:
      The interpolated value.

    • clamp

      public static double clamp(double x, double min, double max)
      Clamps a value between a range.
      Parameters:
      x - The value to be clamped.
      min - The min of the range.
      max - The max of the range.
      Returns:
      The clamped value.

    • mercator

      public static double mercator(double ang)
      Performs a mercator transformation on a latitude angle.
      Parameters:
      ang - The latitude angle.
      Returns:
      The mercator transformation.

    • mercatorInv

      public static double mercatorInv(double mercAng)
      Performs an inverse mercator transformation on a mercator-transformed latitude angle.
      Parameters:
      mercAng - The mercator-transformed latitude angle.
      Returns:
      The initial latitude angle.

    • projectMercatorLatLon

      public static double[] projectMercatorLatLon(double lat, double lon, double minLat, double minLon, double maxLat, double maxLon, double viewPortSize)
      Converts a world latitude / longitude coordinate into an on-screen pixel coordinate. A coordinate that is on the edge of the lat/lon set of coordinates will end up on the edge of the viewport.
      Parameters:
      lat - The input latitude.
      lon - The input longitude.
      minLat - The min of all latitudes.
      minLon - The min of all longitudes.
      maxLat - The max of all latitudes.
      maxLon - The max of all longitudes.
      viewPortSize - The size of the viewport.
      Returns:
      A pixel (x, y) coordinate.

    • projectMercatorLatLonInv

      public static double[] projectMercatorLatLonInv(double x, double y, double minLat, double minLon, double maxLat, double maxLon, double viewPortSize)
      Converts an on-screen pixel coordinate into a world latitude / longitude coordinate. A coordinate that is on the edge of the viewport will end up on the edge of the lat/lon set of coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The input x coordinate.
      y - The input y coordinate.
      minLat - The min of all latitudes.
      minLon - The min of all longitudes.
      maxLat - The max of all latitudes.
      maxLon - The max of all longitudes.
      viewPortSize - The size of the viewport.
      Returns:
      A world (lat, lon) coordinate.

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color stringToColour(String s)
      Hashes a given string into a Color.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to be hashed.
      Returns:
      The resulting Color.

      Parameters:
      seed - The random seed.
      Returns:
      A random colour.

    • distanceLatLon

      public static double distanceLatLon(double lat1, double lon1, double lat2, double lon2)
      Computes the distance between two world lat/lon coordinates, in meters.
      Parameters:
      lat1 - The latitude of the first coordinate.
      lon1 - The longitude of the first coordinate.
      lat2 - The latitude of the second coordinate.
      lon2 - The longitude of the second coordinate.
      Returns:
      The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.

    • distance

      public static double distance(double[] p1, double[] p2)
      Computes the euclidean distance between two set of cartesian pixel coordinates.
      Parameters:
      p1 - The first pixel coordinate.
      p2 - The second pixel coordinate.
      Returns:
      The distance between the coordinates.

    • direction

      public static double direction(double[] p1, double[] p2)
      Computes the angle between two set of cartesian pixel coordinates.
      Parameters:
      p1 - The first pixel coordinate.
      p2 - The second pixel coordinate.
      Returns:
      The angle between the coordinates, in radians.

    • mixColours

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color mixColours(javafx.scene.paint.Color c1, javafx.scene.paint.Color c2, double p)
      Interpolates two colours together.
      Parameters:
      c1 - The first colour.
      c2 - The second colour.
      p - The interpolation percentage (between 0 and 1).
      Returns:
      The resulting colour.

    • ensureVisible

      public static void ensureVisible(javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane pane, javafx.scene.Node node)
      Ensures a ScrollPane's viewport contains the given node, by automatically scrolling to it. Prerequisites: The Node is part of the ScrollPane.
      Parameters:
      pane - The ScrollPane.
      node - The Node that must be visible in the ScrollPane.
